job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Back-End Developer at Watermelon, you focus on ensuring the stability and reliability of our AI messaging systems together with implementing new API's., As a Back-End Developer at Watermelon, you are responsible for developing and maintaining the server-side of Watermelon. You work closely with the Front-End team to implement functionality and integrate it with the user interface. You take pride in the quality of your code and are open to feedback from the team., * Integrating APIs and working with various microservices, constantly striving for improvements.
     * Operating in a fast-paced Continuous Integration & Deployment environment.
     * Working in GitHub and writing automated tests to ensure high code quality.
     * Assisting colleagues and yourself through pull requests, code reviewing, and pair programming.
     * Monitoring platform performance and analyzing ways to enhance it.
     * Contemplating technical choices, such as architecture, tools, and processes., * A flexible remote work policy and working in Utrecht, ideally you also live near Utrecht
     * Travel allowance, pension plan, and a budget for personal development
     * 25 vacation days and a budget to set up your workspace.
     * A culture focused on growth and development
     * The opportunity to contribute to a fast-growing international startup in the AI industry
     * Room for new initiatives and idea
     * A friendly work atmosphere with colleagues you can laugh with and participate in events and team activities
job_details.full_text:
Senior Backend Developer

As a Back-End Developer at Watermelon, you focus on ensuring the stability and reliability of our AI messaging systems together with implementing new API's., As a Back-End Developer at Watermelon, you are responsible for developing and maintaining the server-side of Watermelon. You work closely with the Front-End team to implement functionality and integrate it with the user interface. You take pride in the quality of your code and are open to feedback from the team., * Integrating APIs and working with various microservices, constantly striving for improvements.
     * Operating in a fast-paced Continuous Integration & Deployment environment.
     * Working in GitHub and writing automated tests to ensure high code quality.
     * Assisting colleagues and yourself through pull requests, code reviewing, and pair programming.
     * Monitoring platform performance and analyzing ways to enhance it.
     * Contemplating technical choices, such as architecture, tools, and processes., * A flexible remote work policy and working in Utrecht, ideally you also live near Utrecht
     * Travel allowance, pension plan, and a budget for personal development
     * 25 vacation days and a budget to set up your workspace.
     * A culture focused on growth and development
     * The opportunity to contribute to a fast-growing international startup in the AI industry
     * Room for new initiatives and idea
     * A friendly work atmosphere with colleagues you can laugh with and participate in events and team activities

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend development tasks such as API integration, microservices, CI/CD, automated testing, and code quality. While it mentions 'AI messaging systems' and 'AI industry', it lacks specific details about developing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models, RAG systems, or advanced prompt engineering, which are core to a GenAI Engineer role. It also doesn't emphasize predictive modeling or MLOps in the context of ML models, ruling out an ML Engineer profile. The role appears to be primarily about building and maintaining the backend infrastructure that might support AI features, rather than being an AI development role itself, thus fitting the 'Ambiguous' profile.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes developing and maintaining the server-side, integrating APIs, working with microservices, writing automated tests, and contributing to a CI/CD environment, all of which are core software development activities.
Integrating APIs and working with microservices are fundamental backend software development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrating APIs and working with various microservices

job_tasks.justification: Operating in a fast-paced Continuous Integration & Deployment environment is a key aspect of MLOps and modern software deployment practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Operating in a fast-paced Continuous Integration & Deployment environment

job_tasks.justification: Working in GitHub and writing automated tests are standard practices for ensuring code quality and reliability in software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Working in GitHub and writing automated tests to ensure high code quality

job_tasks.justification: Assisting colleagues, code reviewing, and pair programming are direct indicators of collaboration and communication skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Assisting colleagues and yourself through pull requests, code reviewing, and pair programming

job_tasks.justification: Monitoring platform performance and analyzing ways to enhance it falls under the operational aspect of maintaining and improving deployed systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring platform performance and analyzing ways to enhance it

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'AI messaging systems' suggests some interaction with AI, but the context is about ensuring stability and reliability, not necessarily developing or fine-tuning AI models themselves. It's too vague to categorize as core modeling work.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the stability and reliability of our AI messaging systems

job_tasks.justification: Implementing new APIs is a core backend software development responsibility.
Contemplating technical choices like architecture and tools is part of the software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Contemplating technical choices, such as architecture, tools, and processes

job_tasks.justification: The mention of a budget for personal development and a culture focused on growth and development indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptability.
The opportunity for new initiatives and ideas suggests a role where ownership and innovation are valued.
job_tasks.phrase: Room for new initiatives and idea

soft_skills.phrase: Assisting colleagues and yourself through pull requests, code reviewing, and pair programming
Room for new initiatives and idea
